senses: [{"definition":"A large quantity; many.","example":null},{"definition":"An overflowing fullness or ample sufficiency; profusion; copious supply; superfluity; plentifulness.","example":null},{"definition":"Wealth; affluence; plentiful amount of resources.","example":null},{"definition":"Frequency, amount, ratio of something within a given environment or sample.","example":null},{"definition":"A bid to take nine or more tricks in solo whist.","example":null}]
